document_data.name: Tekkil
document_data.mainbody: '''Tekkil''' was a [[plant]] found in [[Faer√ªn]] that was used as a [[drug]].{{Cite dungeon/126/Vampires of Waterdeep: Blood of Malar|65,74}}
document_data.Description: Tekkil was a succulent plant found in swamps that possessed fat red leaves containing milky sap.
document_data.Usage: Tekkil leaves were chewed to release the milky juice inside of them. This juice acted as a painkiller but also caused lethargy and stupor. A dose of tekkil was valued at 5 [[gold]] [[coin|pieces]].
